authorAttribution.displayName: Miss Adina's Class Story Time and Crafts

originalText.text:
Doctor Staffenberg is exceptional. Our son had sagital synostosis and he did the surgery, he kept us in the loop, kept us calm and informed. I still cried when they took him away but not because I was worried about the surgery itself, just because my baby was about to have his life changed.
Anyway, 10 out of 10 for him and his team. Send me a message if you have questions about him

text.text:

originalText.text: My husband and I highly recommend Dr. David Staffenberg.  Our son recently had a large mole removed from his face by Dr. Staffenberg.  We were concerned about scarring on his cheek from the removal, but Dr. Staffenberg did an excellent job with the incision and the scar should heal completely within a year and be unnoticeable.  We are amazed by his talent and highly recommend him.  His team is so professional and kind.  My five year old son loved them all and felt at ease during the entire process.  Dr. Staffenberg is a brilliant surgeon, and we are so grateful that we found him.

text.text: My husband and I highly recommend Dr. David Staffenberg.  Our son recently had a large mole removed from his face by Dr. Staffenberg. Dr. Staffenberg is a brilliant surgeon, and we are so grateful that we found him.

originalText.text: I am a bit disappointed with Dr Staffenberg. We took our baby to him for plagiocephaly treatment and advice.  At 6 months old the doctor advised us that the issue should fix itself and to come back to reevaluate at 8 months as it will not be too late.  At 8 months, he continued to advise us that the head will round out and that if it were his child he would not recommend a helmet and to come back at 10 months as it will not be too late to make a final decision. At 10 months we decided to go to a plagiocephaly clinic after seeing Dr Staffenberg to proceed with a helmet and were now told that we are on the boarder of it being too late for our son to get a helmet and that our sons case is an extreme case, not moderate based on a simple measurement differential.  We learned that his situation is much more severe than we were told.  We wish that we had been advised at 6 months to go to the clinic for further evaluation. When i did need Dr Staffenberg to expedite my insurance authorization he was extremely helpful.

originalText.text: Dr. Staffenberg did a beautiful job on my son’s cleft soft palate. Eternally grateful to him and his team.

originalText.text: Dr. S is an amazing surgeon.  His work was totally successful.  Wonderful bedside manner with patient and family.  Great office staff.
